result.execSummary:
The defendant Ryan J Thompson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $250 DNA surcharge remitted. $268  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.

Concur to 14CF718. W/h adjudication on ct 1. Def can petition for dismissal of ct 1 after completion of probation. ADA agrees to termination of probation after 18 mo if the agent recommends in writing (provided no ATR's or revocation).

miscConds.notes: $200 DNA surcharge remitted. $243  to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervison or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.
Maintain full-time employment/education or combination of or be seeking same, and treatment.

Defendant shall not use/possess drug paraphernalia and/or controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with co-def or juvenile involved in this case.
Random UA & BA testing at discretion of agent.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.

supervisions.notes:
PROBATION IS REVOKED & SENTENCE IS IMPOSED. 
With huber. Concur to ct 1 but consec to 14CF718.

ADDRESS INFO for Ryan J Thompson
Current: c/o DCJ,   (Effective: 06-03-2015)

W/H adjudication on ct 1. Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights.  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.  Judgment of conviction prepared.

AMENDED SIGNATURE BOND - CONDITIONS MODIFIED
Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
- Defendant shall not use or possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription.
- Defendant shall be within his residence between the hours of 7 p.m. and 6 a.m. unless at, or traveling to or from, school, treatment, or employment or accompanied by either parent.  Curfew can be modified or lifted by probation agent.

AMENDED SIGNATURE BOND - CONDITIONS MODIFIED
Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
- Defendant shall be allowed to make 1 trip to Great America on August 30, 2014, as long as he is in the company of his parents.
- The court orders a signature bond in the amount of $500.00 per case on the condition that the defendant reports to, and complies with, Dane County Bail Monitoring (DCBM).  The defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail.  If the defendant fails to comply with DCBM, a body only bench warrant shall be issued for the defendant's arrest and the defendant shall be held in custody until bail is reviewed by the court.
- Defendant shall not use or possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription.
- Defendant shall be within his residence between the hours of 7 p.m. and 6 a.m. unless at, or traveling to or from, school, treatment, or employment or accompanied by his parents, as approved by BMP in writing.

Bail Amended to:
Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
- The court orders a signature bond in the amount of $500.00 per case on the condition that the defendant reports to, and complies with, Dane County Bail Monitoring (DCBM).  The defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail.  If the defendant fails to comply with DCBM, a body only bench warrant shall be issued for the defendant's arrest and the defendant shall be held in custody until bail is reviewed by the court.
- Defendant shall not use or possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription.
- Defendant shall be within their residence between the hours of 7 p.m. and 6 a.m. unless at, or traveling to or from, school, treatment, or employment or accompanied by his parents, as approved by BMP in writing.
- Defendant shall be allowed to make 1 trip to Great America between Aug 27th to 29th as long as he is in the company of his parents.
